author: Colleen Hoover
description: In the sequel to “It Ends With Us,” Lily deals with her jealous ex-husband as she reconnects with her first boyfriend.
title: IT STARTS WITH US

author: Colleen Hoover
description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
title: IT ENDS WITH US

author: Bonnie Garmus
description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.
title: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: A fictional oral history charting the rise and fall of a ’70s rock ’n’ roll band.
title: DAISY JONES & THE SIX

author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
title: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

author: Kate Morton
description: An unemployed journalist connects events in a true-crime book, which details a long-buried murder in 1959 in South Australia, to her own family.
title: HOMECOMING

author: Curtis Sittenfeld
description: A beach house, summer love and enduring friendships.
title: THE SUMMER I TURNED PRETTY TRILOGY

author: Alice Oseman
description: Nick and Charlie question whether their love is strong enough to survive being apart when Nick leaves for university.
title: NICK AND CHARLIE

author: Rebecca Ross
description: Two young rival journalists find love through a magical connection.
title: DIVINE RIVALS

author: Adam Silvera
description: In this prequel to "They Both Die at the End," Orion and Valentino attend the premiere of Death-Cast in Times Square.
title: THE FIRST TO DIE AT THE END

author: Alex Aster
description: Every 100 years the island of Lightlark appears and a deadly competition called the Centennial takes place.
title: LIGHTLARK

author: Holly Black
description: Runaway Queen Suren and Prince Oak embark on a deadly and dangerous mission to the north.
title: THE STOLEN HEIR

author: Trang Thanh Tran
description: Jade Nguyen travels to Vietnam with her younger sister, Lily, to visit their father who’s restoring an old French colonial house which is haunted.
title: SHE IS A HAUNTING

author: Bonnie Garmus
description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show. Read by Miranda Raison, Pandora Sykes and the author. 11 hours, 55 minutes unabridged.
title: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

author: Shel Van Pelt
description: A widow working the night shift at the Sowell Bay Aquarium is aided in solving a mystery by a giant Pacific octopus living there. Read by Marin Ireland and Michael Urie. 11 hours, 16 minutes unabridged.
title: REMARKABLY BRIGHT CREATURES

author: Colleen Hoover
description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse. Read by Olivia Song. 11 hours, 11 minutes unabridged.
title: IT ENDS WITH US

author: Jojo Moyes
description: Drastic changes and a pair of six-inch high Christian Louboutin red crocodile shoes shake up the lives of two women. Read by Daisy Ridley. 12 hours, 22 minutes unabridged.
title: SOMEONE ELSE'S SHOES

author: Harlan Coben
description: A man imprisoned for murdering his 3-year-old son becomes convinced his son is still alive and plans an escape. Read by Steven Weber. 10 hours, 16 minutes unabridged.
title: I WILL FIND YOU

author: Barbara Kingsolver
description: A reimagining of Charles Dickens’s “David Copperfield” set in the mountains of southern Appalachia. Read by Charlie Thurston. 21 hours, 3 minutes unabridged.
title: DEMON COPPERHEAD

author: Colleen Hoover
description: In the sequel to “It Ends With Us,” Lily deals with her jealous ex-husband as she reconnects with her first boyfriend. Read by Colin Donnell and Olivia Song. 8 hours, 40 minutes unabridged.
title: IT STARTS WITH US

author: Colleen Hoover
description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth. Read by Vanessa Johansson and Amy Landon. 8 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
title: VERITY

author: Dav Pilkey
description: The fourth book in the Cat Kid Comic Club series. After doing their chores, baby frogs work together to create more mini-comics.
title: COLLABORATIONS

author: Tatsuya Endo
description: A gang of assassins and bombs planted throughout a luxury cruiser put Loid, Anya and Yor in harm’s way.
title: SPY X FAMILY, VOL. 9

author: Tui T. Sutherland.
description: The sixth book in the Wings of Fire graphic novel series; adapted by Barry Deutsch and Rachel Swirsky.
title: MOON RISING
